Can be frustrating when you first play. however, once you get into it, it can be very enjoyable indeed.

Casual or competitive the game is too full of cheaters.  Even quiet wallhacks and aimbots are enough to break the game.  Can't recommend a piece of shit game teeming with cheaters to anyone.  Fix the cheating instead of kicking or banning the people calling out cheaters.  Opt for "clean" language for game integrity but do nothing about all the blatant cheating?  Yeah no.  What was once a great game is ruined by the industries laziest developers.
